name: Influtration
description:
Influtration was made for the 2023 Hyland Hackathon, and brought home our second win.

Influtration is about germs, and how exactly they spread through your body.  We figure that the part of educational games that sticks with students is the image of how things play out, and the immune system is just a game waiting to happen.  Take down T Cells and B Cells and whatnot in this rather silly game.

Controls:

WASD: move

That's it!  Be careful about how you move though.  Bumping into cells while your screen is clear will spread your infection, but if your screen is red then run away.

The in game tutorial explains everything, just don't fly past it too quickly.
